item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by Narcotics Anonymous
item.description: "Insanity is doing the same thing, over and over again, but expecting different results." -- Narcotics Anonymous

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by سهراب سپهری / Sohrab Sepehri
item.description: "چرخ یک گاری در حسرت واماندن اسب اسب در حسرت خوابیدن گاریچی مرد گاریچی در حسرت مرگ" -- سهراب سپهری / Sohrab Sepehri

item.title: Mohammadreza add a quote by سهراب سپهری
item.description: "زندگی شستن یک بشقاب است" -- سهراب سپهری
